thread.title: Just Want To Introduce You All To Luke Perry's Son, Jungle Boy
thread.title_full: Just Want To Introduce You All To Luke Perry's Son, Jungle Boy

author: Lauren Yapalater
title: Just Want To Introduce You All To Luke Perry's Son, Jungle Boy
text:
View this image ›
Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images ID: 10345684 2. And these are some blurry ass photos of Luke Perry watching a wrestling match. youtube.com
youtube.com
 ID: 10345840 3. Why is he watching a wrestling match, you ask? ID: 10345843 4. Because his son is Jungle Boy. View this image ›
Facebook: jungleboynatecoy ID: 10345671 5. That’s right, this is Luke Perry’s son, Jake Perry AKA Jungle Boy Nate Coy. View this image ›
Facebook: jungleboynatecoy ID: 10345673 6. He’s a 19-year-old wrestler. View this image ›
Facebook: jungleboynatecoy ID: 10345672 7. And just in case you haven’t noticed already, he has beautiful hair. View this image ›
Facebook: jungleboynatecoy ID: 10345860 8. Obviously his papa Luke has nice hair too. But upon further investigation I’ve found that the good hair gene actually comes from his mom, Minnie. View this image ›
Time & Life Pictures / Getty Images And that they are basically identical.
ID: 10345876 9. Here is Jungle Boy in action: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=sfEG_tzWCEU . youtube.com ID: 10345574 10. And thank you, Luke Perry’s son, Jungle Boy, for already saving 2017. ID: 10345893 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
